name: Elea: Episode 1 - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Official soundtrack from the first episode of Elea. Composed by Simeon "Zimone" Hristov
Audio files can be found in the game installation directory.

Tracklist:

  • Baby Name
  • Beyond Recovery
  • By The Shore
  • Cargo Bay
  • City Solace
  • Fairy pt 2
  • Fairy pt 1
  • Flying Whales
  • Guitar Revisited
  • Heatwave
  • Intro
  • Kazumi Emerges 2
  • Lost Moment
  • Main Theme
  • Menu Theme 2
  • Megumi Conflict
  • Message of Distress
  • NTFL
  • Old Theme Idea
  • Psychadelic 2
  • Psychadelic
  • Resolution
  • Skycastle
  • The Explorer Fixed
  • The Record
  • The Pool
  • The Shaft
  • Treeroom 2
